mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_stock(stock_id, goods_id, shelfdate, `number`, supplier_id, updatetime) VALUES (#{stock.stockId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stock.goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock.shelfdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{stock.number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stock.supplierId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT tb_stock.id, stock_id AS stockId, goods_id AS goodsId, shelfdate, `number`, supplier_id AS supplierId, tb_stock.updatetime, tb_supplier.name AS supplierName, tb_production.name AS productionName FROM tb_stock LEFT JOIN tb_supplier ON supplier_id = tb_supplier.id LEFT JOIN tb_goods ON tb_goods.id = goods_id LEFT JOIN tb_production ON tb_goods.production_id = tb_production.id
